name: Island generator (dewolen)
description:
Generate simple islands and walk around them

Controls:
MOUSE to orbit around, ESCAPE to release the cursor;
In first person mode: WASD/MOUSE to move;
Generating interface on screen
Five topmost sliders control landmass noise parameters (hints on hover)

Generator keeps crashing? Try checking the "Single threaded generation" checkbox (might freeze the game for a few seconds)
